sentences.en: 300 tons of Peruvian mangoes were kept from entering France.
sentences.cn: 300吨秘鲁芒果被禁止进入法国。

sentences.en: Couples are breaking up a four - thousand - year - old Peruvian vase shipped UPS.
sentences.cn: 夫妻感情的破裂,就象 四千年 的秘鲁古瓷花瓶被UPS快递后的结果,无法弥合.

sentences.en: He discovered that it tasted like a Peruvian bark that was often used as a painkiller.
sentences.cn: 他发现尝起来与常常用以做止痛药的一种秘鲁树皮很像.

sentences.en: I am Oscar Santa Maria Huertas, official pilot of the Peruvian Air Force, currently retired.
sentences.cn: 我奥斯卡圣玛丽亚尔塔斯, 正式试点的秘鲁空军, 目前退休.

sentences.en: Moreover, the Peruvian draft also unifies the rules governing both civil and commercial obligation.
sentences.cn: 另外, 秘鲁的草案还统一了民事债与商事债女方面的规则.

sentences.en: Peruvian President Garcia attended the opening ceremony the meeting and made a speech.
sentences.cn: 秘鲁总统加西亚出席了会议开幕式并发表讲话.

sentences.en: Peruvian villagers already on the edge of survival are enduring bitter cold linked to climate change.
sentences.cn: 在生存边缘挣扎的秘鲁的村民们正忍受着气候变化所带来的严寒.

sentences.en: Recently a substantial number of cases of self - heating of Peruvian fishmeal during oceangoing transport.
sentences.cn: 近来,秘鲁鱼粉在远洋运输过程中屡次发生自然事故.

sentences.en: The Battle of Papudo between Spain and a combined Peruvian - Chilean fleet.
sentences.cn: 1865年,在西班牙和一支秘鲁 - 智力联合的舰队间发生的帕普多战役.

sentences.en: The mobile telephone is in Peruvian use, caused small wave motion.
sentences.cn: 移动电话在秘鲁的使用, 引起了小幅波动.

sentences.en: The Peruvian will run for him, and l'll pick my runner.
sentences.cn: 那个秘鲁人会帮他跑, 而我要选自己的参赛者.

sentences.en: This flower is known as a Peruvian lily.
sentences.cn: 这种花被称为秘鲁百合花.

sentences.en: Waters off the Peruvian coast become unusually warm, destroying the local anchovy fishing industry.
sentences.cn: 由于异常的高温,秘鲁海岸的海水温度变化异常, 影响了当地的凤尾鱼捕捞业.
为什么秘鲁工人离职 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: A Peruvian is someone who is Peruvian
